name: Creation Fit Back Support/Waist
description: The Sabrina body shaper vest reduces waist instantly using this vest style. Designed to accelerate weight loss through compression and sweating process, it also helps to mold your figure and support your back. The non adjustable strap model provides the most coverage of the upper back area. Hip shaping girdle helps to lose weight and eliminate toxins through sweat and compress. Firm and superior boning that immediately corrects posture, reduces waistline, firms and flattens the tummy and lower pooch area. Controls waist and abdomen keeping it always coke bottle correct. Non-Adjustable straps with a braless body shaper provides great bust Flexible boning defines and accentuates the waistline. Helps with the conditions of weight gain, lower back pain, postpartum, C-section, abdominal surgical procedures, and overweight due to pregnancy and maternity. Made of natural Latex to give you maximum abdominal support Body Fabric: 97% Cotton 3% Elastane Lining 100% Natural Hevea Latex Imported Wear this girdle from 1 to 3 hours on the first week and gradually increase the length of time you wear it, until you feel comfortable enough. Thereafter, it’s recommended to use it from 8 to 10 hours daily. Choose the size corresponding to your measurements in order to prevent discomfort during use or damage of the girdle. The Nia should not be worn while sleeping, when taking showers, in steam baths or saunas. If you have physical problems, consult your doctor before wearing the girdle.

name: Creation Fit
description: Designed to accelerate weight loss through compression and sweating process, it also helps to mold your figure and support your back area. Firm and superior boning that immediately corrects posture, reduces waistline, firms and flattens the tummy. Controls waist and abdomen keeping it always coke bottle correct. Helps with the conditions of weight gain, lower back pain, postpartum, C-section, abdominal surgical procedures, and overweight due to pregnancy and maternity. Made of natural Latex to give you maximum abdominal support Body Fabric: 97% Cotton 3% Elastane Lining: 100% Natural Hevea Latex Imported Wear this girdle from 1 to 3 hours on the first week and gradually increase the length of time you wear it, until you feel comfortable enough. Thereafter, it’s recommended to use it from 8 to 10 hours daily. Choose the size corresponding to your measurements in order to prevent discomfort during use or damage of the girdle. The Anastasia can be worn by beginners, while sleeping, and during a light workout. f you have physical problems, consult your doctor before wearing the girdle.Note: It is suggested you order according to your shirt size, but please follow our size chart carefully
